page.title: 09TRELLECH COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: MRS. APPLETON IS CHAIRMAN OF TRELLECH COMMUNITY COUNCIL. SHE IS INTERESTED IN THE VILLAGE AND SURROUNDINGS AND LIKES IMPROVING THE AREA. IN THE COUNCIL THERE ARE 11 MEMBERS AND ONE PART-TIME CLERK. THE COUNCIL ELECTIONS ARE HELD EVERY FOUR YEARS. THEY MEET IN THE CHAPEL AT 7.30 PM. EVERY MONTH. THE AREA COVERED FOR OUR COUNCIL IS TRELLECH TOWN, LLANISHEN, PENALT, CATBROOK AND LLANDOGO. ALL THE COUNCIL MONEY COMES FROM THE RATES. THE COMMUNITY COUNCIL DEAL WITH ANYTHING THAT AFFECTS THE PEOPLE OF THE AREA. THE COUNCIL WORRY ABOUT BUILDINGS BEING KNOCKED DOWN FOR THE FUTURE OF THE AREA. THIS IS WHAT THE COMMUNITY COUNCIL IS WORKING ON AT THE MOMENT: THE CARPARK: FOOTPATHS:BUS SHELTERS,AND TRACING WATER FROM THE OLD LOCAL ANIMAL POUND.
